DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to evaluate the reliability of the avascular root surface area as a prognostic identification criterion for gingival recessions and to compare the predictive value of the Miller classification and avascular root surface area (AERSA) calculation on the final root coverage outcomes.
DOC.brief_title: An Explorative Study To Develop A Predictive Model Based On Avascular Exposed Root Surface Area For Root Coverage
